Instructions

Study

Complete these tasks in order:

  • Read chapter 2.1–2.3 (up until p.75)
  • Read ‘Intelligent Design Has No Place in the Science Curriculum’, Harold Morowitz, Robert Hazen, and James Trefil
  • Read ‘Design for Living’, Michael J. Behe
  • Study the notes.
  • Start watching this series of videos. View as many as you find interesting.

Assignments

  • Complete essay 3 by Monday @ 11:59pm.
